name: nonconne

body.origin:
|- wn(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)))
-| wn(wfal)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)), wfal)

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)))
-| wn(wfal)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)), wfal)

|- wn(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)), wfal)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)), wfal)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wne(c0, c1), wfal))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wne(c0, c1), wfal))

comment: Law of noncontradiction with equality and inequality. (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2012.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 21-Dec-2019.)
